metaTitle: NATURA PINET M7 La Marina | 3 Bed Villas From €459,000
metaDescription: Discover NATURA PINET M7 in La Marina, Alicante. 3-bedroom modern villas from €459,000. ASA development, delivery April 2027. 40% less than island markets.

content.heroIntro: NATURA PINET M7 represents a unique opportunity to own a contemporary 3-bedroom villa in El Pinet, La Marina—one of Alicante's most sought-after coastal communities. Developed by ASA, a trusted builder known for quality construction and attention to detail, this exclusive project offers stunning modern homes with 98m² of living space on 145m² private plots. Starting from just €459,000, these villas deliver exceptional value, priced 40% below comparable Spanish island markets, while maintaining premium finishes and sustainable design. With delivery scheduled for April 2027, NATURA PINET M7 combines strategic location, investment potential, and lifestyle appeal. The development caters to international buyers, families, and investors seeking beachside living with easy access to world-class amenities, championship golf courses, and a thriving English-speaking community.

locationSection.intro: El Pinet in La Marina is a distinctive coastal community that perfectly balances Mediterranean charm with modern convenience. Located on the Costa Blanca's northern coast, this area has evolved into a preferred destination for international homeowners seeking authentic Spanish coastal living without compromising on amenities. The region benefits from a established international community where English is widely spoken, making it ideal for expatriates. La Marina offers proximity to pristine Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, quality healthcare, and excellent shopping facilities, all within 20-30 minutes. The area's consistent property value appreciation of 8% year-on-year reflects strong market fundamentals and growing demand from European buyers seeking Mediterranean homes.
highlights: Airport: 30 minutes to Alicante International Airport (ALC)
Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including notable regional clubs
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining from traditional Spanish cuisine to international options

propertyFeatures.intro: NATURA PINET M7 villas exemplify modern construction standards with premium specifications throughout. Built to contemporary European building codes, each property features high-quality materials, energy-efficient systems, and thoughtful design that maximizes natural light and indoor-outdoor living. ASA's commitment to excellence is evident in every detail, from structural integrity to aesthetic finishes. The 98m² homes are designed to feel spacious and comfortable, with open-plan living areas that flow seamlessly to private outdoor spaces. Climate control, modern kitchens with integrated appliances, and quality bathroom fixtures ensure everyday comfort and convenience.
features: Private communal swimming pool with access
Double glazing with thermal break insulation

content.investmentSection: NATURA PINET M7 offers compelling investment fundamentals in a market demonstrating strong growth. La Marina's property values have appreciated 8% year-on-year, outpacing many European markets, with prices 40% below comparable offerings in Spanish island destinations. The rental market is equally attractive—furnished villas in this location command €800 per week, generating approximately €41,600 in annual rental income. The established international community, proximity to beaches and golf, and ongoing infrastructure development create sustained demand. Whether seeking a personal retreat, family holiday home, or rental investment, NATURA PINET M7 delivers financial stability and lifestyle appeal that increasingly attracts European buyers seeking Mediterranean properties with real income-generation potential.
whyBuySection: Strategic coastal location in El Pinet, La Marina
Trusted developer ASA with proven construction excellence
Modern sustainable design with premium finishes
Exceptional value—40% less than Spanish island markets

Easy access to multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Proximity to several championship golf courses nearby
Strong rental income potential—€800 per week market rate

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in NATURA PINET M7?
faqs.answer: From €459,000 for 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas with 98m² of living space on 145m² private plots. This represents exceptional value, priced 40% below comparable Spanish island properties. Contact us for current availability and payment plan options.

faqs.question: When will NATURA PINET M7 be completed?
faqs.answer: April 1, 2027. ASA provides a 10-year structural warranty standard on all properties. We offer flexible payment schedules aligned with construction milestones. Contact us for specific timelines and available move-in dates.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of NATURA PINET M7?
faqs.answer: ASA, an established Spanish developer with a strong track record building quality homes throughout La Marina and the Costa Blanca. ASA is known for attention to detail, premium finishes, and reliable delivery. All NATURA PINET M7 properties include developer warranties.

faqs.question: Is La Marina a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. La Marina demonstrates strong fundamentals: property values appreciating 8% year-on-year, an established international community where English is commonly spoken, excellent healthcare with regional hospital within 30 minutes, and multiple Blue Flag beaches accessible within 20 minutes. It's ideal for both lifestyle and investment purposes.

faqs.question: How far is NATURA PINET M7 from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes' drive. The nearest beaches offer excellent swimming, water sports, and beach restaurants. The coastal location provides easy beach access while maintaining proximity to inland amenities and golf courses.

faqs.question: What amenities are near NATURA PINET M7?
faqs.answer: Abundant amenities nearby: Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets plus local markets for shopping; regional hospital with English-speaking doctors within 30 minutes for healthcare; several championship golf courses nearby for recreation; diverse restaurants from traditional Spanish to international cuisine; direct access to beaches and coastal activities.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my NATURA PINET M7 villa?
faqs.answer: Yes. Furnished villas in La Marina currently achieve approximately €800 per week in rental income, generating strong annual returns. The established tourism and expat community creates consistent rental demand. Many owners successfully combine personal use with vacation rental management.

faqs.question: What are the property costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs include transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees, and registration fees, typically totaling 8-12% of purchase price. Annual costs include property tax (IBI) averaging 0.4-1.1% of cadastral value, plus community fees for shared amenities. We provide detailed cost breakdowns during consultation.

content.conclusion: NATURA PINET M7 represents a rare opportunity to acquire a premium modern villa in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable communities at exceptional value. With delivery in April 2027, proven developer credentials, strong rental potential, and appreciation fundamentals, these homes appeal to discerning buyers seeking Mediterranean lifestyle with genuine financial returns. Whether your priority is beachside living, investment performance, or a family retreat in an English-speaking community, NATURA PINET M7 delivers compelling answers. Properties are released in phases, with current availability limited. Contact our team via WhatsApp to arrange a private consultation, virtual tour, or site visit. Let us help you secure your Costa Blanca home before these exceptional properties are sold out.
